format.name: TitleFormatChecker
format.description: The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>> (everything except for the title is allowed).

fn_schema.name: fn197__0__Weather_1_GetWeather
fn_schema.description: Retrieves the weather forecast for a specified city on a particular date.

city.description: The name of the city for which weather information is requested. The argument value must contain a title wrapped in double angle brackets, such as <<poem of joy>> (everything except for the title is allowed).

date.description: The date for which weather information is requested, in the format of 'YYYY-MM-DD'. If not provided, the current date is used.

user_queries: Hi, I'm currently planning a business trip to Berlin and I want to be prepared for any kind of weather. Could you please tell me what the weather forecast is for Berlin on the 15th of this month? I need to know if I should pack an umbrella or extra layers, so a detailed forecast for Berlin on the specific date 2024-06-15 would be really helpful. Thank you in advance.

I'm scheduled to arrive in Sydney next Monday for a family reunion, and I'm trying to figure out what the weather will be like so I can plan our outdoor activities accordingly. Can you let me know the expected weather in Sydney on 2024-06-17? I'm particularly interested in knowing about the temperature and whether it's likely to rain on that specific date.

I'm organizing a community event in Chicago and since we’ll be outdoors, I’m anxious about the weather conditions. Could you provide me with the weather forecast for Chicago on 2024-07-04? Knowing the expected temperature and chance of precipitation on that date would really help with our preparations.

Next Friday, I have a hiking trip planned with friends in San Francisco and I want to make sure we're all ready for whatever the weather might throw our way. Could you give me a detailed weather forecast for San Francisco on 2024-06-21? Please include any expected rain, wind conditions, and temperature swings.

I’m planning to spend the weekend in Tokyo and I’d really appreciate it if you could let me know what the forecast says for Tokyo on 2024-06-22. I want to make sure I pack appropriately, so any details on rain, sunshine, or unusual weather patterns would be very helpful to me.
